item.title: At least 2,571 killed in Iran's protests, U.S.-based rights group HRANA says
item.description: The death toll from protests in Iran has reached 2,571 people, the U.S.-based HRANA rights group said on Wednesday.

item.title: Russia watches as ally Iran edges closer to collapse. Here's why it matters for Moscow
item.description: The prospect of another ally falling in the Middle East will be a worrying one for Moscow, particularly after it has seen other alliances collapse rec...

item.title: Trump's playbook on Greenland, Venezuela, and Iran is about taking on China, analysts say
item.description: President Donald Trump's international interventions may all come down to one thing: China and its dominance of critical minerals.

item.title: Greenland and Denmark prepare for a White House showdown
item.description: The high-stakes meeting comes shortly after Greenland and Denmark's leaders portrayed a united front against Trump's takeover threats.

item.title: Trump’s tariff gambit over Iran risks derailing U.S.–China trade deal
